maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-01.js.orig: Another minute in this infested mess and I would have died of boredom.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-01.js.text: Encore une minute de plus dans ce chaos infesté et je serais mort d'ennui.

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-01.js.orig: Now come on. Let's get this over with. And stay out of my way, capiche?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-01.js.text: Bon aller, on y va. Et reste en dehors de ma route, capische ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-01.js.orig: That's right! We are within the \c[3]infested jungle\c[0]! A mysterious disease has befallen this part of the forest!
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-01.js.text: C'est exact ! Nous sommes dans la \c[3]jungle infestée\c[0] ! Une maladie mystérieuse s'est abattue sur cette partie de la forêt !

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.orig: Look, such a nice and perfectly regular mushroom.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.text: Oh, regarde, un beau champignon parfaitement normal.

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.orig: What an admirable and perfectly average mushroom!
That's a nice regular mushroom, isn't it?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.text: C'est un beau champignon normal, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.orig: This part of the jungle is pretty creepy, non?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.text: Cette partie de la jungle est assez angoissante, non ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.orig: What is it, Pentafist?\. Are you afraid?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-02.js.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a, Pentafist ?\. Tu as peur ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: \c[3]Infested Marshes\c[0]
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: \c[3]Marécages Infestés\c[0]

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Hm...\. getting kinda hungry for mushrooms.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Hm...\. J'ai un peu faim de champignons là.

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Really? Those huge blue and purple mushrooms make you hungry?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Vraiment ? Ces champignons énormes bleu et violet te donnent faim ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Why not?\. Don't you folks eat cheese with blue mold and stuff like that?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Pourquoi pas ?\. Vous mangez pas du fromage avec du moisi bleu et des trucs du genre ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Whoa, hold up!\. Let's not fall back to stereotypes here!
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Ah non hein !\. On va pas tomber dans des stéréotypes !

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: But oui...\. Roquefort is pretty neat sometimes.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Mais oui...\. Parfois, le Roquefort c'est super bon.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.note: So neat that Société is starting making non-Roquefort, 'to please customers'

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: So many giant mushrooms in this area.\. Do you think those are edible?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Il y a tant de champignons géants dans cet endroit.\. Est-ce que vous pensez qu'ils sont comestibles ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: It's safer to assume they're not!
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: C'est plus sûr de considérer qu'ils ne le sont pas !

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: ...Wait...
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: ... Attends...

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Those enemies definitely don't belong here...\. this is weird!
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Ces ennemis n'ont vraiment rien à faire là...\. Ça colle pas ici !

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Yeah, how did they end up here?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Oui, comment ils ont pu arriver là ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Hey, thanks for cleaning up this mess!
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Hé, merci pour avoir remis de l'ordre dans cet endroit !

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Seriously, how did this even happen?
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Sérieusement, comment ça a pu arriver ?

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Lily
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Lily

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Priel
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Priel

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Hey, Lea.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Hé, Lea.

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: So it seems there is this huge commotion going on to the \c[3]south of the arena\c[0].
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Donc on dirait qu'il y a l'air d'y avoir du beau bazar \c[3]au sud de l'arène\c[0].

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: Yes, there's all kind of random enemies here!
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Oui, il y a toutes sortes d'ennemis rassemblés là-bas !

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: And we all know what that means.\. Reize must be close.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: Et on sait tous ce que ça veut dire :\. Reize doit être dans le coin.

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.orig: We're sorry for all the trouble... but your help would be really appreciated right now.
maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-03.js.text: On est désolé pour tout le dérangement... mais je crains qu'on ait à nouveau besoin de ton aide.

maps/jungle/infested/infested-path-04.js.text: C'est un champignon d'une forme assez étrange...
